== Select, Enable or Disable Panels ==
Are you looking for customization? So, Make you own layout by enabling or disabling from the panel list.

== Select and Drag Panels ==
Just click on a panel an drag it to positioning. Easy, eh!?

http://arducam-osd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/config_imgs/drag.jpg

== Save and Load Layouts from File ==
We can save our favorite layouts to share with our buddies.<br>
You didn't save it? No problem. You can load direct from the board as well as save it to another one.

http://arducam-osd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/config_imgs/load_save_layout.jpg

== Video Mode Switching and Adaptive Layout ==
ArduCAM firmware has an adaptive layout. Now you can easily check on how it will look at PAL or NTSC.
